title: Comforting the Comforter?
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>*Sigh*~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>My, what’s the matter, Nozomi? You look so tired.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Let me stay like this until everyone’s here. New years has been so busy~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Ah, shrines are really packed during the new year’s, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I’m happy to see the faces of our visitors, but it’s really tiring....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You did great. Would you like something sweet?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Don’t worry, I’m fine. I’ll feel better in a bit~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>At least let me spoil you. I’ll keep it a secret from everyone, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>....Then, I would love some strawberry milk right now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Got it♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
